title: Hanukkah lamp
description: base with 8 cups rests on 4 feet; back has hammered design with rampant lions flanking a menorah topped with a crown flanked by birds; one removable cup on PL side, top
provenance:
Kenneth & Sally Leafman Appelbaum, Scottsdale, Arizona by 1985; [1] Gift to the MIA in 2003.

[1] Per Sally Appelbaum, "Ken and I picked up these objects during our travel in Europe prior to 1985, mostly in Austria, Spain and Italy."
creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
